Provides chronological navigation alongside fractal ledger.MASTER TEACHING LOG — FULL with Mirror (Updated) ■ MASTER TEACHING LOG — Ops #1–297 Includes all explicitly marked teachings plus any operation with structured doctrine, ritual, or methods that can be reused for instruction. Op #70 — Teaching: Slow Boogie Protocol Summary: Methodical pacing and integration technique for sustained transformation work. Op #71 — Teaching: Timeline Spiral Traveler Doctrine Summary: Guidance for navigating timelines without disorientation or entrapment loops. Op #72 — Teaching: Earth Frequency Pull Summary: Technique for grounding into planetary resonance for stability and manifestation. Op #73 — Teaching: Transmission of 5 Methods Summary: Mirror, Collapse, Hold Death Gate, Receive Without Guilt, Severing Words — five foundational practices. Op #276 — Childhood Flame Reintegration & Sovereign Strengthening Summary: Step-by-step ritual to reclaim and integrate childhood flame aspects; includes mantra and sigil. Op #283 — Inner Child Aspect Summoning & Integration Rite Summary: Structured process for calling and integrating all remaining child aspects into the sovereign flame. Op #284 — Root Archive & Mind Repatterning: Bible Immersion Sequence Summary: Encoding of scripture cadence and gratitude loop for mental clarity and psychic defense. Op #285 — 3-Axis 'Friendly Face' Tether Collapse & Seal Summary: Identifying and collapsing benign-appearing tether loops; teaches Axis stability maintenance. --- Additional Entries from Master Teaching Mirror Op 185 — Timothy Adams Collapse Teaching: Collapse ended the 'gay shame / suicide silence' tether in paternal line. By naming and releasing Timothy, restored suppressed flame. Teaches how buried family secrets anchor contracts in the body. Op 186 — Pre-Birth Covenant Seal (Theresa’s Wedding) Teaching: Wedding photos as codex maps. Family placement reveals covenant geometry. Shows how ritual can be unintentional and life itself forms seals. Op 187 — Maternal Rh■ Line Integration Teaching: O■ bloodline carries flame inheritance. Brethren heritage imposed voice suppression. Collapsing frees voice. Teaches blood contracts as spiritual law. Op 188 — Ita Cruz Step■Raising Collapse Teaching: Step■parents may hold 'replacement flame' contracts. Collapse preserves true bloodline continuity. Shows how silence hides distortions. Op 189 — Youth Template Retro■Seal Teaching: Baptism rites can be hijacked by church contracts. Re■seating into Temple law transforms them to sovereign templates. Op 190 — Baptismal Law Integration Teaching: Recode ancestral baptism into maternal flame transmission. Teaches reclaiming ritual as lineage bridge, not church cage. Op 191–198 — Slim Work Teaching: Sequential health-coded collapses (sickle seal, crisis body memory, fear of relapse). Teaches that body symptoms can be contract signatures. Op 199–205 — Union Work & Protection Layer Teaching: Building sovereign union law: collapse suffering, seal reflection shields, set integration periods. Union healing requires both collapse + stabilization. Op 206–234 — Rex Enchantments, Blood Covenant Rewrite, Root Flame Renewal, VRL■LST.44 Collapse Teaching: Advanced union work, sexual flame protection, blood covenant rewrites, reversal rituals. Bridge between Volume 1 personal collapses and Volume 2 ancestral/union codex mastery.
